name: EduTECH Africa
content: EduTECH will open a whole new world of possibilities for education in Africa, an unprecedented opportunity to enable education professionals to obtain the most relevant and innovative content and experiences that lead to the revolutionisation of education in Africa. Prices: Gold Pass: ZAR 4250 Free Pass: ZAR 0 Time: 8:00 am to 5:00 pm Venue Details: Sandton Convention Centre, 161 Maude Street, Sandton, Johannesburg, 2196, South Africa
